ace-playbook-infrastructure.description: ACE playbook documentation system with YAML frontmatter and auto-generated insights tracking

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Documentation system using YAML metadata to track pattern evolution and insights

incremental-learning-system.description: System that tracks pattern usage over time with insight counts and history

machine-generated-documentation.description: Auto-generated documentation with clear markers and timestamps

explicit-empty-state.description: Explicitly document empty states rather than leaving files blank

structured-metadata.description: Use structured metadata formats (YAML frontmatter) for machine and human readability

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file structure and metadata patterns
